edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.gui.widgets

Class KeyboardShortcut

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.janeway.gui.widgets.KeyboardShortcut

  • public class KeyboardShortcut
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs the given action when a keyboard event is received that matches the keyboard shortcut this class represents.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<javax.swing.Action> actions
      The list of actions to perform when a KeyEvent is received that matches the keyStroke
      protected javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke
      A KeyStroke representing the combination of keys required for this shortcut

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyboardShortcut(javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke)
      Constructs a new KeyboardShortcut for the combination of keys represented by the given KeyStroke.
      KeyboardShortcut(javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke, javax.swing.Action action)
      Constructs a new KeyboardShortcut for the combination of keys represented

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAction(javax.swing.Action action)
      Adds the given action to the list of actions to perform when this KeyboardShortcut is pressed
      private void performActions() 
      boolean processKeyEvent(javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke)
      Determines if the given key stroke matches this shortcut.
      void removeAction(javax.swing.Action action)
      Removes the given action from the list of actions to perform when this KeyboardShortcut is pressed

    • Method Detail

      • processKeyEvent

        public boolean processKeyEvent(javax.swing.KeyStroke keyStroke)
        Determines if the given key stroke matches this shortcut. If it matches each of the actions is performed.
        Parameters:
        keyStroke - the key stroke to compare

      • addAction

        Adds the given action to the list of actions to perform when this KeyboardShortcut is pressed
        Parameters:
